{"id":1001106157,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"3 months, 3 weeks","timestamp":1690042007,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"397 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1001106157/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Ways to Express an Integer as Sum of Powers","memory":"69.9 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    vector<long long int> v;\n\n    int numberOfWays(int n, int x) {\n        int i = 1, t = 1;\n        while (t == 1) {\n            long long int a = pow(i, x);\n            if (a <= n) {\n                v.push_back(a);\n            } else {\n                t = 0;\n            }\n            i++;\n        }\n        vector<vector<int>> dp(v.size() + 1, vector<int>(n + 1, 0));\n        int mod = 1e9 + 7;\n\n        for (int i = 0; i <= v.size(); i++) {\n            for (int j = 0; j <= n; j++) {\n                if (j == 0) {\n                    dp[i][j] = 1; // Base case: there is one way to make sum 0 with no elements.\n                } else if (i == 0) {\n                    dp[i][j] = 0; // Base case: there are no elements to make a non-zero sum.\n                } else {\n                    dp[i][j] = dp[i - 1][j];\n                    int remaining_sum = j - v[i - 1];\n                    if (remaining_sum >= 0) {\n                        dp[i][j] = (dp[i][j] + dp[i - 1][remaining_sum]) % mod;\n                    }\n                }\n            }\n        }\n\n        return dp[v.size()][n];\n    }\n};\n","compare_result":"","title_slug":"ways-to-express-an-integer-as-sum-of-powers","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
